name: Culturro
description: Culturro's employee experience platform, Agnya, identifies the areas at scale and moreover, automatically works with the stakeholders to fix the issues. All using technology. Net result? Lower employee turnover, higher performance, higher top line, and fatter bottom line.
features: MAKE BETTER DECISIONS Consciously align your company's culture wit
PRE-EMPT Listen and act before small problems become big and start having huge impact.
DRIVE ROI Add to your top-line by increasing workforce productivity and reduce costs of attrition.
Headline: Culturro: Boost Employee Value and Fuel Business Growth
ShortDescription: The Employee Experience Platform Increasing Lifetime Value For Remote And Distributed Teams

Highlights.name: Maximize Employee Lifetime Value
Highlights.description: Culturro helps organizations unlock employee potential, leading to increased performance and longer tenure -  key factors in boosting Employee Lifetime Value (eLTV).

Highlights.name: Data-Driven Employee Engagement
Highlights.description: Culturro goes beyond surveys with interactive tools that provide actionable insights. This allows for personalized interventions that improve employee engagement and satisfaction.

Highlights.name: Strategic Advantage Through People
Highlights.description: Culturro empowers companies to build a strong, motivated workforce. This translates into a competitive advantage with a team that is highly skilled, productive, and less likely to leave.

enhanced_description: Culturro offers 'Agnya', an employee experience platform designed to identify issues at scale and automatically facilitate their resolution with stakeholders using technology. It is specifically tailored for remote and distributed teams, aiming to increase Employee Lifetime Value (eLTV) by unlocking employee potential, improving performance, and extending tenure. The platform provides data-driven, interactive tools that go beyond traditional surveys, offering actionable insights for personalized interventions. Culturro empowers organizations to pre-emptively address small problems before they escalate, build a strong, motivated workforce, and gain a strategic advantage through their people. This approach ultimately leads to lower employee turnover, higher workforce productivity, increased top-line revenue, and reduced attrition costs, contributing to overall business growth.
competitive_advantages: Automated facilitation for issue resolution with stakeholders
Scalable identification of employee experience issues
Data-driven, actionable insights from interactive tools (beyond surveys)
Proactive problem identification and resolution to prevent escalation
Specific focus on increasing Employee Lifetime Value (eLTV)
Optimized for remote and distributed teams
roi_benefits: Attainment of strategic advantage through a strong, motivated workforce
scalability_features: Designed to identify and address employee experience issues at scale
